===About===
This plugin allows using of Far2 plugin under Far3.

1. Rename original (Far2) plugin file (i.e. calcU.dll -> calcU.dl_).

2. Copy !Far3Wrap.dll (or !Far3Wrap64.dll) to plugin folder (near calcU.dl_).

3. (optionally) Rename !Far3Wrap.dll to more obvious name (i.e. calcU.dll).

4. Create wrapper ini file. It must match exactly with wrapper file name, renamed on step 3, or '!Far3Wrap' originally (i.e. calcU.ini).

Sample wrapper ini files are included in distribution.
